text:
"net stop apache" causes the Apache shutdown process to hang forever, and
then Win2000 shows 
up a bluescreen, and a complete restart is necessary.

The same thing happens with the tray 
program as well.
creator: gargravarr@whoever.com

text: Are you using any firewall type program?
creator: slive@apache.org

text:
Presuming ZoneAlarm is running, since this report is nearly identicial
  to the earlier report.  Please reopen if you do not have ZoneAlarm
  installed on this machine.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7932 ***
creator: wrowe@apache.org
